description: a real-time viz for AmeriFlux sensor data output at UMBS AmeriFlux core site

options.content:
- drag over a zone to zoom in
- only view one dropdown at a time so that data loads faster
- queries only go back 1 day, so changing the time frame won't get data older than that  
- if a graph isn't showing any data, try changing the time range and refreshing
- link to GitHub

panels.description: sample air temperature at 46m, 34m, 15m; 10-minute average air temperature at 3m
panels.title: Air Temperature by Height

panels.description: RH measured at 46m, 34m, 15m; 10-second average RH at 3m
panels.title: Relative Humidity by Height

panels.description: sonic temperature at 46m, 34m
panels.title: Sonic Air Temperature by Height

panels.description: wind vector speed calculated from directional sonic wind speed at 46m, 34m; anemometer wind speed at 46m
panels.title: Wind Speed by Height

panels.description: 5-minute average wind vector speed calculated from directional sonic wind speed at 46m, 34m; anemometer wind speed at 46m
panels.title: Average Wind Speed by Height

panels.description: CO2 concentration sampled at 46m and 34m
panels.title: CO2 Concentration by Height

panels.description: 5-minute average CO2 concentration sampled at 46m and 34m
panels.title: Average CO2 Concentration by Height

panels.title: H2O Concentration by Height

panels.description: 5-minute average H2O concentration sampled at 46m and 34m
panels.title: Average H2O Concentration by Height

panels.description: 46m CO2 concentration vs sonic Uz wind speed

panels.description: Kipp & Zonen CNR1 radiation metrics measured at 46m

panels.description: LI-COR downward-facing PAR measured at 37m, in micromoles per square meter per second, red if last reported value is below 0.1
panels.title: Downward PAR

panels.description: Soil temperature measured at 5 different depths, averaged over 3 stations per depth
panels.title: Soil Temperature by Depth

panels.description: Soil moisture measured at 3 different depths and 3 times over a range of depths (3 horizontal sensors and 3 vertical sensors), all in percent volume
panels.title: Soil Moisture by Depth
